participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and laid-back, enjoys gaming and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy. I try to look professional, but I'm not too concerned about my appearance. I've reached 50k subscribers! I shop online a lot. I'm looking for a way to help my dog with his behavioral issues.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, values honesty and self-reflection.
participant_2.background: My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings. I created the mobile that hangs above my baby's crib. I drive a black car. I am a great cook. I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.

content.text: Hey! I'm glad to meet you!  What do you like to do?
Hey there!  I like to read, play video games, and cook.  What about you?
I like playing video games, too!  I also like to go for walks with my dog.  What do you like to cook?
I like to make all sorts of things, but my favorite is probably making pasta.  What's your favorite kind of food?
I love pasta too!  My favorite kind is penne.  What's your favorite video game?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Super Mario Odyssey.  What about you?
Oh, I love that game!  I'm also a big fan of Zelda games.  Have you played Breath of the Wild?
I have!  It's so good!  I love the open world aspect of it.  What are you playing right now?
I'm playing a lot of Animal Crossing right now.  It's a really relaxing game.  What about you?
I haven't played that game yet, but I've heard good things about it.  I'm playing a lot of Stardew Valley right now.  It's a really fun farming game.
I've heard good things about that game too.  I might have to check it out!
